entry.title: Improving PyPI's security with Two Factor Authentication
entry.summary:
Description

Since March, [Trail of Bits](https://www.trailofbits.com) has worked with the PSF to implement and land major security improvements in [Warehouse](https://github.com/pypa/warehouse/), the codebase that drives [PyPI](https://pypi.org). This talk will cover just one of those improvements: the addition of two factor authentication to user logins. Attendees will learn about the technical details of two factor schemes, the security properties they can (and can not) provide, and the process for making major changes to core Python infrastructure.
